title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, January 21, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Eva Ibbotson (1925), who said, “My aim is to produce books that are light, humorous, even a little erudite but secure in their happy endings.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Eva Ibbotson (1925), who said, “My aim is to produce books that are light, humorous, even a little erudite but secure in their happy endings.”
